column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Daw says : " Kuvira is headed our way ! "
#Text=Korra says : " How long will it take to get the plasma saws ready ? "
#Text=Asami says : " Just a few more minutes . "
#Text=Korra says : " Get out there as soon as you can . "
#Text=Baatar Jr. says : " If you do manage to get inside , find the engine room .
#Text=We may not be able to beat that thing , but we can slow it down .
#Text=Let 's go !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Jinora !
#Text=" Wu says : " Oh , Yin , you 're the sweetest evacuee I 've ever known .
#Text=And I just want to thank you for being so kind , when I was living in your home .
#Text=" Earth Empire sergeant says : " Halt !
#Text=Turn around slowly and please , stop that singing .
#Text=You 're all Earth Empire prisoners .
#Text=Come with us and no one will get hurt .
#Text=" Wu says : " You do n't need these people .
#Text=They 're just innocent civilians caught in the crossfire , but I 'm Prince Wu , rightful leader of the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=Take me to Kuvira .
#Text=I 've got business with her .
#Text=" Tu says : " No !
#Text=Do n't do it , Wu .
#Text=" Wu says : " I have to .
#Text=But before I go , I 'd like to sing you a song .
#Text=If you do n't respect the broach , you do n't respect me .
#Text=Oh , no , no , no , no , no .
#Text=You 're no better than a roach , but I 'm royalty .
#Text=I got my badgermoles with me .
#Text=" Earth Empire sergeant says : " Actually , your song is so bad , your badgermoles deserted you .
#Text=" Wu says : " You do n't know what you 're talking about .
#Text=Oh , badgermoles I love you , I love you .
#Text=I want to , I want to pet your snouts .
#Text="
